Package onelineatatime

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Constants
    Allows to easily change parts of the design and layout This class is never instantiated, it is only used for static constants.
    GUI
    GUI Provides the main JFrame for the graphical application.
    GUIInputMode
    Provides the JPanel which is displayed when we need to input text to enter text insert mode.
    GUIReaderMode
    Provides the JPanel where the text is read one line at a time, using buttons or arrow keys.
    GUIStartPage
    Provides the initial startpage to the main GUI frame, where you choose PDF or Text insert mode.
    OneLineAtATime
    One Line at a Time is a small program which lets you read long texts one line at a time.
    PDFHandler
    Provides the use of the Apache PDFBox API to load the pdf and its text.
    TextReader
    Handles splitting and processing the text, and returning them as lines to be read one at a time.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoNextLineException
    Dummy exception thrown when the TextReader has no more lines to send.
